definitions.text: socially or conventionally correct; refined or virtuous

examples: it is not comme il faut for a gentleman to be constantly asking for money

definitions.text: conforming to conventions of sexual behavior; - George Santayana
examples: speech in this circle, if not always decent, never became lewd

definitions.text: observing conventional sexual mores in speech or behavior or dress
examples: a modest neckline in her dress
though one of her shoulder straps had slipped down, she was perfectly decent by current standards
